document.title: Whatsapp corpus Berntzen
document.intro: Whatsapp conversations collected by master students Communication & Information Studies (2013-2014; 2014-2015). All participants in the conversations are over 18 and have signed consent forms. Metadata per conversation are available in CMDI XML files. The corpus has been made available ... Whatsappdata collected for the PhD research of Lieke Verheijen (Radboud University). Informed consent only from contributor and not from conversational partner. Consequently, the subcorpus only contains contributions from the submitter. Metadata per conversation are available in CMDI X...
